values:
looking back I can't believe that I thought/wrote/etc. some of that stuff.  Some embarrassing, some pathetic, some sad, some hilariously unfocused C:  

What's happening today?.....

Brandon, I still love you.  I always have.

since the last entry......

-I became sax section leader; we were amazing.
-I was a senior.
-School moved into 4A; band tied for 6th; all other sports excelled.
-learned that I will not become a teacher, fo' sho'.
-christmas -yay!
-got over brian 
-got over brandon
-SURVIVED GOVERNMENT WITH DODIE.
-Got accepted into CofC!!!!!!
-Graduated
-rejoiced

Salkehatchie is coming up again and I'm stoked about that.

Can't wait to go to charleston again!  as in this week!

we'll see what life throws my way soon

-lovelove

"Juice Box Paper Hat and a line of Pixie Stix" - PlayRadioPlay

So many surfaces so colorless and bland
I've got so many colors in my new box in my hand
One day I'll think about getting
But today I'm just gonna color the sky

Start with the blue draw circular clouds
Then with the green I add the food for the cows
Next with the red I draw a house too small
For any real real person but that don't matter at all

Brown bird with a triangular beak
Yellow legs with three lines for feet
A green car with circular headlights
Bust out the scissors, gonna bring this drawing to life

Mommy please don't make me go to school
I wanna draw a castle and a dragon in a swimming pool
Yellow starts in the black
Blue moon with a happy face these days it's not right

Juice box paper hat and a line of pixie stix

I wanna be the one there
To draw you pictures and play with your hair
Virginia beach isn't too far away from you
Maybe this summer it won't be for me too



^^^^-translated to German, then French then back to English equals....


Thus, much of surfaces I have if without color and with softness thus much of colors in my news   box in my hand during one day I think of receiving   am however today me right Outward journey to colour the sky with blue clouds of circular of amount   start then with that I add green the food for the cows in more with that draws initially red   too much me a small house a true true person   however those not above all to constitute bird with   an angular invoice of the legs with three lines for feet brown colour yellow a green car with circular headlights the shears make jump outside and go, this drawing with the life to take of Mamma not   me to the school please I will leave would like a lock to draw and Drache in Swimmingpool   begin yellow in with black blue the moon with one   happy face of these days it is the paper hat of box and there a line of eleven stix does not have a presentiment of enough me would like that to be to draw Illustrations and play with your hair Virginia beach of this one is not to you too faraway perhaps It is also not the summer for me 



Pretty weird, eh?

Brian = amazing     I really wished that we lived closer to each other, things would be much better.

Caroline and Patrick broke up.  I'm not kidding.  It's forreal.  And so I'm going to the beach with Caroline this next week to care for her and make sure she's okay and stays that way.  

My daddy's in the hospital.  and I don't know what to do.

Thursday:  I got more layers!!!  Omg.  Lynn is truly my hero!  

Friday:  Awesome day!  Brian came to Clover!  And even though we pretty much just drove around for 4 hours, it was great.  I haven't laughed that much in a while.  My cheeks were in some serious pain for the rest of the day!    Now I just have to convince my mom to let me swing down to Summerville for a day.  

Saturday:  FirstBEAT!!!!!!  Rode down to Irmo with Caroline and Patrick (love those kids!).  It was so much fun!  I love hanging out with them - unless it comes to making a decision - haha!  But anyway, Cadets got first.  They had the weirdest show - Volume 2:  Through the Looking Glass(???) - and I didn't much care for it, BUT it was executed wonderfully.  I was rootin for Phantom (2nd or 3rd) or Crown (4th).  I still got a Cadet shirt before the show - still neat.  

Sunday:  Nursery at church.  sleep/eat

My life is unbelievably arid and monotonous.  But I love it.  : )



'we're living in a den of thieves
rummaging for answers in the page
we're living in a den of thieves 
and it's contagious.....
they made a statue of us
they made a statue of us
our noses have begun to rust...' - R. Spektor

sleep & I are NOT getting along now-a-days......gah
couldn't sleep until 4 something this morning - grrrr - then woke up at NOON! - ahh!  c'est terrible!

watched Prime - good movie

gym - ran 2.5 miles - discovered that I've lost a total of 9 lbs. not cool

babysat - cleaned their house - didn't get paid - enough said.

came home to good food, a shower, and Will & Grace!  yay!

and now I'm here - wishing I was either at band camp, Biarittz, or Penn Center - either way, it works.  

Yeah - so I'm totally boring - I'm using someone else's playlist tonight.  I'll have my own by tomorrow (hopefully) - we'll see how time is

I might be going to see Crown tomorrow night!!!  yeah!!!  leah, syd, pat maybe and some of his people - yep - good stuff

I get my haircut tomorrow! - Hooray for Lynn & layers!!!!!!!!

yeah - boring & pointless - that's my life!

Well, if cookie dough is the cure for loneliness, then cookie dough has become my new best friend.  

I'm constantly tired - but I can never sleep.

I rented Pride & Prejudice today - I wasn't really sure what to expect - But it was good.  I only cried a little - but I'm allowed to express such emotions every once in a while.  Plus, no one was there to witness this event, so we'll just say it never happened.  Anyway, I highly recommend this movie, but the book even more-so.

While I was at Salkehatchie, I lost 7 pounds.  Yep.  whatever.  I'm not really big on losing weight because I don't need to lose any, just tone up a bit.  However, in the 4 days since my return, I have gained at least 4 of them back.  I have become a total fatty.  eww.  gross.  I know.  I'm working on it.  

Salkehatchie was every positive word that I could ever think of.  And I can't wait until next year! (And 5A state!)

I'm bored & lazy & tired, yet I can never sleep - It's not the same anymore....

Playlist:
- Imogen Heap "Goodnight & Go" & "Hide & Seek"
- Matchbook Romance "Tiger Lily"
- Billy Joel "Piano Man"
- Billie Holiday "I'll Be Seeing You"
- Michelle Branch "Everywhere"
- Avril Lavigne "Things I'll Never Say"
- Zero 7 "In the Waiting Line"
- Remy Zero "Fair"
- Ryan Adams "Come Pick Me Up"
- The Shins "Caring is Creepy"
- Beck "Girl"
- Train "Meet Virginia"
- The Calling "Wherever You Will Go"

Yeah most are old/lame - but it's what I'm listening to - so deal : ) - goodnight goodnight!

got the car back!!!!

still tired/depressed - blah
I am trapped in my own home - my God! - My car is gone and I have no means of getting to the outside world! - Help me!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

To see you when I wake up
is a gift I didn't think could be real
to know that you feel the same as I do
is a three-fold utopian dream

You do something to me
that I can't explain
so would I be out of line, if I said
I miss you

I see your picture, I smell your skin on
the empty pillow next to mine
you have only been gone ten days
but already I am wasting away

I know I'll see you again
whether far or soon
but I need you to know that I care
and I miss you
(I miss you)

-Incubus



This totally describes everything right now.  I wish I was back at Penn Center with everyone.
June 10 - 17  I am at Salkehatchie in Beaufort - call the cell if I am needed.  803-627-4123  later kids!

GO SEE X-3!!!!!

RIGHT NOW

YOU DESERVE IT

IT IS THE BEST BEST BEST BEST MOVIE I HAVE EVER SEEN!!!

STOP WHATEVER YOU ARE DOING AND GO SEE X-3!!!!!!

NOW!!!!!!!!!

9 days - yeah - that's terrible

anyway...

Sat.- syd's - pool - tan - tristan+isolde

Sun.- church with syd - pool - swim - tan

Mon - caroline's

Tues.- caroline's - workout - pool - WATERFALLLLLL!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Weds.- chill at home

Thurs.- discover that I get to take the SAT on saturday! -  rent movies!

Fri.- chill - apply to carowinds - early night

Sat.-5:30 wake up call - SAT - (<<<gay!!!) - bombed it - home - syd's - night

Sun.- church - movies @ syd's - home with flurry - Rey Azteca with caroline - home - target with caroline

yeah - boring - sorry - you'll just have to deal because I'm tired and didn't really want to do this in the first place.....sorry - blah!

This summer I'm really going to keep up with this thing!

This summer I'm going to hang out with my friends - a lot.

This summer is going to be my last summer before I graduate.

This summer is going to be hot.

This summer will be great.



I got an 82 on my eng. exam.  damn.  and I really studied for it too.  I'm just really worried about my alg. II exam ::shudder::

Graduation was tonight.  I didn't go to the actual graduation, but Wesley and I went after-wards and saw a few people.

THEN!! we went to Patrick's house and chilled til midnight - it was fun.  We played MadGab with Pat's cousin and his girlfriend, who were really cool.  Then we just hung out.  Even though we didn't really do anything then, it was still fun.

That's what I want to do this summer - just chill and enjoy everything and everybody.  I'm not going to try to make everything perfect and amazing - just take what I get and love it.

Speaking of Wesley - Kirsten broke up with him  (!) - I didn't really get any details about it, but what I do know is really sad.  I'm not 'taking sides' in this situation because I can see from both sides and understand what's going on.  But it just breaks my heart for Wesley because I could tell that he really really liked Kirsten.  But, luckily, he's doing pretty good.  

I've got to start working out!  There's this gym in lake wylie that I'm going to try to join or something - I need to get in shape!

I've officially started my spring cleaning! - I took 4 hours yesterday to clear off my floor, organize my shoes, clear off my desk, change the sheets on my bed, put on new ones, and find sneakers.  It was in some desperate need of cleaning!  And I'm still no where near finished - I've totally got to re-arrange it again.  I hate it the way it is.  

Kirsten's party was last weekend!!!!!  It was awesome!!!!!  So much fun!!!  'I stink, therefore I am."  hahahahahaha - good times.
We've definitely got to get the girls together more often this summer.

well, I'm exhausted.  I'll be back within a few days (hopefully).  peace.
I am an old cow hand from the Rio Grande.

Eng. Exam tomorrow - I think I'll be okay on it - yeah, I probably should go study that some more now seeing as nothing super-majorly important has happened recently      




















 aaaaahhhhhh!!!!!!!  : )

May 9th - Jazz Band Concert was so amazingly awesome that it's hard to put it into words.  It was that great. 

May 10th - still trying to finish 1984, but having an extremely hard time with it.

May 11th - We'll, I'm officially sick.  I was supposed to babysit Mrs. Strauss' 4 kids tonight, but I'm just coughing and sneezing all over the place & I don't think it's best that I watch her kids in this condition.  But I did get Kirsten C. to do it for me.  I love that girl!  She's just so damn dependable!  But yeah, Mrs. Strauss wasn't very happy when I told her that I wouldn't be able to watch her kids that night.  *shrugs*  Oh well, at least I found a suitable replacement.

May 12th - Still reading  1984.  It's a good book, I'm just having a hard time sticking with it.  Probably because the first week I had it I was reading The DiVinci Code instead (<<<< Most Awesome Book EVER!).  Oh well.    Still sick.  Went to the doctor today and found out that I HAVE ALLERGIES!!!!!!  gah!  But the doctor was cool about it and gave me a popsicle.  AND the nurse guy that does all the basics was SO FREAKING HOTTTTTT!!!!!!!!!!!  OMG he was so gorgeous!!!!!  

May 13th - Went shopping with Syd for Mother's Day gifts.  It was fun.  We went to Chilie's afterwards, since we'd both been cravingn it for about a month.  I got my mom this really nice candle and chapstick from Bath & Body Works, and I painted the candle for her.  
Caroline's Dance Recital!!! - It was so good!  Everyone was great.  I kind of almost wished I never had to quit.  
Beginning of season finale of Grey's Anatomy is tonight! 

May 14th - Mother's Day!!! - Mom loved her candle!  -  But my stupid sister had to ruin it by making mom take her shopping.  gah!

May 15th - Band Concert!  It was great.  
I called Brandon afterschool to see if he could come to the concert, but unfortunately he's going to be in Columbia all summer.  dang.  oh well.  I've got Salkahatchie boys to keep me company.  (jk)
The season finale of Grey's Anatomy was on tonight.  It was amazing/awesome/terrible/heart-breaking/inspirational all at once.  I've never cried over a t.v. show until tonight.  And I wasn't just crying-I was sobbing.  It just relaly opened my eyes to everything.  It was beautifully done.  

May 16th - Still trying to read 1984 - we have a project on it due thursday, and the quiz on part III, and I just finished part II.  maaaaaaan.
I got a babysitting job this saturday for my cousin's 2 little boys.  They're really good, so it's gonna be great.  

May 17th - still on 1984.
I got my Exam review for Alg. II - scary.
Too late to sign up for the next SAT - but I got a thing for the ACT which I'm probably not going to be able to do either - oh well - I'm just gonna have to get on it next time.

May 18th - Turned in my 1984 project - it was okay
Went shopping with Mom and got some great stuff - woot!
On our way home from shopping there was this minor storm, but it managed to knock down a tree RIGHT IN FRONT OF OUR DRIVE WAY!  But there were a few people there who managed to save the day - thank god!

May 19th - Half Day!
Rey Azteca for lunch
Got Yearbooks - which suck ass! - the band doesn't even have a page, while the choaliers got 2 pages! - And there are so many typos!  minor things too!  It's so bad - BUT My Mom did get the Yearbook dedicated to her which was really great - I almost started crying - it was so sweet!
Band Banquet was preety sweet - I got Section leader-woot! - and I looked extremely hott.
Went to McD's with Caroline & Mrs. Susan afterwards to discuss everything.  It was cool.

And That's about it!

Enjoy!

Mom got yearbook dedicated to her

I got Sax Section leader

I'm too tired

more later

...

pick me
choose me
love me
kiss me
be with me
want me
hold me
laugh with me
help me
fly with me
answer me
arrest me
teach me
lift me
change me
provoke me
need me
enjoy me
suffer for me
take me
lose yourself with me
wish for me
think of me
wonder about me
impair me
break me
fix me
gain me
lose me

gamble with my heart

play a sick game with my emotions

leave me gasping for air-once again

I'll play your games if only you'll promise me your heart in return.

Is it sad that three of my best friends are the people whom I find completely atrocious?!?!

well, sadly enough, this is true.





Own up to what you did.  


It really wasn't that big of a deal.


It really disappoints me that you can't trust me enough to tell me.  When have I let you down in the past?


And it's not even what you did that makes me sick, but the fact that you're too cowardly to tell me.

So, yesterday began pretty well seeing as a woke up at 9 with plenty of time to just chill and do whatever. 
Got Colin's boutonniere (sp?) at 10.
Home by 10:20.
chill.

Then I got bored at noon.  So I I.M.ed leah and asked if I could come over until syd and I went to get our hair done.  She said it was fine.  Went to Syds.  Piddled around there for a while.  So then were about to leave in a few and I decide that I want to go jump on the trampoline for just like, 2 minutes.  And Leah went with me.  So we're on the trampoline just having a grand old time.  and then leah gave me a super jump (which I love) and I ended up not really aiming the right way on the trampoline-so I go flying towards the edge, my hip lands on the bar, and grab the tree somehow and topple to the ground.  IT WAS GREAT!  Even though I ended up with a bruised hip ON THE DAY OF PROM!!! But it was cool after my mom got me icy-hot patch-things.

Then I went to get hair done, and Lynn was amazing!  My hair was literally perfect!  It really couldn't have been any better.

Colin looked great!!!!!  His hair was excellent!!!!!!  He, also, couldn't have been better!  Gah, everything about yesterday was perfect!!!!!  

Prom was awesome!  I really had such a blast!  Like, I didn't think it would be that great, but it was!  And I got to dance with everybody, which was also freaking sweet!  Gah, we danced like the WHOLE time.  So much fun!!!!!!  

After party-Also awesome!!!!!  Everything was phenomenal (except for that one hour and a half that we're going to ignore)!!!!!  especially the food!  gah! great!

---I don't recommend the movie Hostel.  It sucks.  No plot whatsoever.---

Breakfast also great.


Everything about the past 2 days has been superb!  

Now I can't wait til next year!


And all of the girls decided that we're going to wear our prom dresses to the band banquet on the 19th.  That should be a good night too!

Ahhhhhhh!!

Even though I'm about to fall asleep right now, I'm on such a happy high!  I'm just still excited about everything!   : DDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDD






There was something really freaky that happened this morning too, but I'm way to exhausted to talk about it now.  I'll get to it later.

Today is the actual audition for drum major!    OMG   I'm getting a little nervous.  But Trae told us to just walk in there like we already had it.  With all the confidence that was acceptable.  And IF I mess up, I can get right back in without making a big deal.  But I can't mess up today.  And I'm going to try my best not to.  

ALSO------PROM IS TOMORROW!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!    AHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHH!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!  OMG I'm like so excited beyond belief!!!!!!!!!! !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!  : DDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDD

First day of DM tryouts.  It was awesome!  We all did really well too.  I really love this.

Yeah, but if I don't get it, oh well.  I will have tried and done my best. No worries.  
And I'll at least I'm guaranteed section leader!


NO MORE DL!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!  WOO!!!!!!!!!!!!


Prom on Sat!!!!!  I can't wait!

If the United Nations had never been established, right now we would be in the middle of World War VII.  Also, people would be living on Antarctica because they wanted to get out of wars and live peaceful lives.  Unfortunately, their peace would be disturbed when the French try to invade and conquer Antarctica.  This would lead to yet another world war, and the world would continue on in this fashion until we destroy the world and only the Russians remain because they have colonies on Mars.

2 huge tests next week
DM tryouts
Prom
Huge paper due Fri that I haven't even started on
DM tryouts!!!

*inhale*

 



*exhale*






*inhale*













*exhale*











I've just got to get through next week, then I can just sail through life.......I can't wait.





Went to the flower shop today to pick out one for prom.  I think I decided on one, but I'm gonna talk to Colin first, so if you read this, just call me  803-627-4123.  If not, we'll talk sometime soon.

!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!WESLEY KISSED KIRSTEN!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!   FINALLY!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!AHHHHHHHHHHHHH!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! WWWWOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

DM = scary......no, more like terrifying, but there is a HUGE chance that I won't get it.  Not because I can't do it, but because of political reasons, which are freaking gay!  and totally unfair!!!!!!!!!
But it's okay.  I've learned to deal with this kind of stuff.  But it still hurts....only at first.

DL paper is a beast!

I'm getting tan!!!  yay!!!!  

yeah, that's about it.

DM tryouts

Even though I may be good enough, damn politics will play a major role in it.  

It is totally unfair.  

I am going to do this, and I will get it.  I don't know or care what I have to do.  I will have this.  








'They say that it will make me or break me.  I guess they don't know that I am unbreakable.'

Everything is good now, everything is fine and safe.  
It's over. 
No more.
We're at peace.

I can't tell you how relieved I am that everything has been settled, pretty peacefully.  I hope that everyone involved in this can just forget about it and move on.  It's what I'm going to try to do.  



Summer is closer than ever, and I can almost taste it.  




DM tryouts are next week.  I'm beyond nervous.  I'm terrified.  I haven't even decided on a final piece.  and there's a possibility that he might give us a piece.  Ahhh!

Lets talk.  Not through other people, or LJ.  Lets talk, you and me.  over aim, the phone, whatever.  Please just try to talk this out with me.  I hate fighting, and I hate even more that I'm fighting with you.  We don't have to be friends again, but we can at least end this.

"Ok look, I know you don't like me right now, and that's fine.   But answer this for me:  If our "friendship" is failing, then why the hell are we still going to prom?"      nah, too harsh.  


"Look, I know that I'm not your favorite person right now, but you really aren't mine either.  And I'm really sorry that things are this way".....    nope, not there yet.


"Hey, i know things between us haven't been a fairy tale, but lets just be mature people instead of being at each other's throat constantly..."    that just might work......

I found this in Mike's MySpace.  Gah, I've missed that kid and his writing.  and I really miss Midday.  Yeah, so I really liked this piece.  I can really related, which is always nice.    



I told you to drop the drama, and you continously bring it. 
You can't let go of the past, when this is the present. 
You say your grown up and have improved and have not, you are still the same. 
I am tired of arguing with you,and i'm tried of trying to help you see past the past. 
Your stuck on it, and if you can't let it go, there's no hope. 
I'm not playing games anymore, and I keep telling you this, and yet you don't believe.
When your ready to grow up and handle love the way it's supposed to be handled, when your ready to let your heart truly open it, talk to me. 
It's ok to be hurt, i'm hurt by everything you've told me the last couple months. 
Do not create drama for me.

yeah, so I've been going to the tanning bed, and today just happened to be the day that I got burnt.  yeah.  great!  *sigh*  oh well, it'll be good by tomorrow afternoon hopefully, b/c I'm going again!  

Jazz Band rocks like nobodys business.  hands down.  that's all there is to it.

yeah, and that's about it.  : D

By the way, that huge W Civ paper that I was freaking out about a few weeks ago, yeah I made a 100 on it.  Oh yeah, That's just how awesome I can rock it!!!!!!!!!





Where are we 
What the hell is going on 
The dust has only just began to fall -Imogen Heap

...

I finally realized something today.  

Though people make mistakes and must learn from them, we should not be tormented by them.  
I made a mistake and I have learned from it.  

I don't deserve this.  
Yes, I messed up, but I learned from it, and I know better.  That's what you do in life, you make mistakes and you learn from them.  It's all you can do.  Live and Learn.  (like the luvs commercial!)

I would love to be able to baby you about this, but you've just got to grow up and move on. 

I'm sorry.  That's all there is to it.

Ok, I managed to finish my 2 papers for DL, clean my room, and have some fun at the final Indoor competition before Spring Break.  Woo hoo!

Now, on the Spring Trip....Lots going on with Helen, Cody, Logan and Lauren.  L and L broke up, and were fine.  H and C did the same, and it was mutual at first, but the next day, C decides to "stir things up" and make a big deal about it.  There are so many fine details that it would take a year and 6 days to explain it all in an understandable manner.
Syd and Trey were all over eachother the whole time.  Whatever, they're happy, and it's all good.
Conner still hates me.  I have no clue what to do about it.  I tried to talk things out, but he wouldn't give me a chance.  And the only thing I want is for us to at least be friends again.  I miss my Conner-hugs.  *shrug* oh well, this is the punishment I receive for my mistake.
Matt and I are super cool now.  Like we friend bonded over the trip, and we're buddies now.  it's all good (?)
I had cramps during the entire trip.  enough said.
It was a sucky schedule, but whatever.  I tried to make the best of it.
The beach was great for the 20 minutes that I got to spend on it.  yeah, got to wrestle with Jew in the sand, and managed to get his shoes off, and get a LOT of sand in my pants (<the not fun part), but it was pretty good.
I'm just super glad to be home.

I think I have either a syst (sp?) or a sty (sp?) on my eye, and it's REALLY annoying!!!  ahhh!

Going off to the mountains tomorrow morning to de-tox.  finally!  I've needed this trip since about new years.  

Still must write Lord of the Flies paper for Eng.  I'll probably be able to do that Monday though.  *sigh* DL monday morning.  I hope I get to miss it.  I can 
get the notes from...someone *shrugs*

I'm so tired.  I only got about 10 hours of sleep on the whole trip, when I should've gotten like, at least 25.  gah.  tired........zzz..........zzzzzzzzzz.zz.....z.........z..z.z.........zzzzzzzzz..........z....zzz......zzzzzzzz...................................................................

I bet none of this is making any sense....I'm just kind of rambling.......yeah................................need sleep..................
OMG!!!!! I am so freaking stressed!!!!!!   AHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHH!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

"will we ever be friends again like we used to be, before everything happened?"

"dunno.  right now, that's the farthest thing from my mind.  bye."

wtf.

I'm trying, but he's not working with me.



whatever.


Still excited about the 88.
Finished the teacher cadet paper.  and it's actually pretty good.  
Less stressed and I feel good.

OMG I made an 88 on my W Civ test !!!!!  omg, like, I even did better than patrick a.!!!!!!  AHHHHHH!!!!!  I'm like super jived about this!!  

AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAANNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDD!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

The Chronicles of Narnia is going to be on DVD next tuesday.  Holy Man.  That is going to be a great day!!!!!!!!!

I am pretty content with everything at the moment!  : D

hmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmm....................
Maybe I should've given Ed a second chance.  He is a super awesome and super hott guy.  I mean, He really is my type of guy, I just got freaked out that one day, and totally gave up on everything.  oh well, another one of my famous mistakes.

yeah, Colin is now one of my good friends.  Like, he's totally freaking awesome.

Ok, so people who obsess over other people really freaking suck!

Especially when that person that they're obsessing over lives forever and 20 minutes away!

eww....they're really gross

Ruth is over here and we're watching old chs pagent things and the band christmas concert and laughing at everything.  great stuff.

(marge simpson sound.....)

yeah long sleeve tye-dye shirts rock like no body's business.

later

I swear, I've got to be bipolar or something.  I'll be so depressed one day, and then happy yay skippy the next.  It's really weird and I don't like it.  

Ok, so I'm not going to Charleston this weekend with the drummers and guard.  sadness.  oh well.  I'm going to babysit syd's cats though, and they're really sweet.  I guess I can catch up on some homework and start tanning.  

Me and Matt are buddies again.  we're cool.  and this is really great b/c I don't need any more weirdness with certain guys.  

But there is one in particular who is acting strange still.  I tried so hard to make things easy and normal, but he is still pushing me away.  I finally gave up and just let him be.  It still hurts though.  One of my best friends is now being "distant"  and it really sucks.  Maybe I need to think over some other plans and ask him what he really wants.  

Sometimes I just really wish that I had a guy that I could just go and cry to and he would understand and not ask a thing, and just let me cry on his shoulder.  

"In three words I can sum up everything I've learned about life: it goes on." - Robert Frost

Conner is still going to prom with me.  thank god!

Concert Festival is here this week!!! woo hoo!  It's awesome and most of the bands have been really good.  Today's the last day, so I'm definitely going to watch some performances tonight.

I think Ben Robertson "asked" me to the prom today.  Like I was going up to buy the tickets for me and conner, and then Ben came up to me and said, "Colleen, do you have a date for this thing?"  "Yup!"  and then 2 seconds later after he'd walked off I realized what he was trying to say, and then I felt so bad!!! like, heartbreak slap in the face!!  I felt really bad.  *shrugs* but he's a tough guy, he'll survive.  

Mr Brown, the student intern in band, is really awesome.  Like he's a really cool guy, and really bott.  But he's even older than Brandon, so there is definitely no hope for that.  w/e.  but yeah, he's like so funny.  but when he first came here, he was so stiff and boring.  Then caroline and ruth and I brought him out of his shell.  but yeah, Brown's awesome.

WE GOT STRAIGHT 1's AT CONCERT FESTIVAL !!!!!!!!!! THE ONLY BAND WITH GRADE 6 MASTERWORKS!!!!!!!!!!!! THAT'S PRETTY FREAKING SWEET!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! WOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! GO CLOVER!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

So, I'm not going to Charleston with the indoor groups this weekend.  Oh well.  I will definitely be there in 2 weeks at Rock Hill for the final competition. 

Today isn't a break.  Today is a catch up day.  Typing notes, and band practice 6-9.  

I went shopping yesterday, and that was great.  It always feels good to blow someone elses money.  Started my new summer wardrobe.  : )

Going to Syd's later.  we've got stuff to talk about.  yeah....

later kids!

Indoor Drumline & Winter Guard competition today!  It was really great.  and both groups did exceptionally well.  It was so awesome.  I learned today just how much I miss marching band, and all the people and adrenaline and bus trips.  

I really can't wait til marching band!!  I'm already super excited about the next season.  I really really really really really really REALLY want to be drum major.  but even if I don't get to do it, I'll still be glad that I get to participate in something as awesome as this.

There's another indoor competition next weekend in Charleston.  I'm gonna try to go to that one too.  I might have to stay with my cousins down there though.  but it's cool because they're really nice, and they have a really cute dog.  

I've still got a lot to catch up on this weekend.  But at least I've got all the laundry done!  still gotta type notes and study for DL, write my TC essay and finish cleaning  my room.  woo hoo!  


well, I've got notes to type.  later kids

So, according to my parents, I'm not good enough for anything.  I don't do a damn thing and if I actually do something, I can't even do it fucking right.  
I CAN'T DO ANYTHING RIGHT!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Everyone is always finding a way to put me down.  Everything fucking sucks.  

Just when I'm beginning to think that things are getting better for me, something shitty has to happen and bring me right back to this hell, which everyone knows as life.   I hate this.  

NO ONE EVEN SEES!!!! everyone is blind! This isn't just normal, yeah that kindof sucks.  No, this is, omg that really fucking sucks for you.  but no one sees!  they don't notice.  and if they do, then they just ignore it.  

I can't do a damn thing right.  there hasn't been one day this year where I haven't made another damn mistake.  

Crying only makes things even fuzzier.  so fuck that too.

The only way that I can really say what's going on is through writing.  But even then, I know better than to tell my parents about that kind of stuff.  To them, it's not acceptable.  It's not good enough.                 They don't even think that I can get into college.  She is threatening to take away the one thing that will give me freedom.  FUCK HER!!!!!!!  She can go to fucking hell for all I care!  She doesn't understand, and never will.  

The sun makes me smile.  But I am forced inside where I must type these damn notes.  I can't smile....


I really do try my best.  But it's just never enough for anybody.  Why can't anybody just be satisfied with something, just once?  




Maybe I don't even deserve to live.

a continuation of the previous "perfect guy" list

-NO HOLLISTER WHATSOEVER
-no drinking smoking or trying to get me to do any of that stuff
-no fakes
-be a man and fess up to what you did, if you did something wrong


There'll be more later, i'm sure.

Ok, I got this idea from Colin who got the idea from someone else, so yeah....

This is my ideal guy:
-Smart
-Confident
-makes me laugh a lot, but knows when to be serious
-Has a skill....it could be anything productive or really neat, just as long as it's a skill
-Honest
-accepts my honesty
-will love me for me

-dresses with some class and effort
-must wear polo's/button up shirts
-must try for special events (i.e. dates, family parties, etc)

-can NOT be afraid to show affection
-can't be scared to love me, and let the world know
-enjoys walks in the park
-will talk with me for hours about anything

-he must respect me
-Knowledge
-loves to read
-will get me a flower, just b/c he loves me 
-will explain things to me and try to teach me something new everyday, as I would for him
-He must not be afraid to let the world know that he loves me and I love him



I guess it's pretty obvious that I like serious relationships.  yeah...deal.  


Today was today.  Nothing really special except for Jazz band, which wore me out.  Dinner with Brent at Courtney's.  then here.  ::shrugs::  


I miss so many things.  I want so many things.  I wish for too many things.  
I don't know what to do about these things.  
I'm so confused about so many things.
I don't even know what I want!!!  How is that possible!?!??  It's my mind!  I can I not know what is best for me.  Everyone has been pushing me in all these directions that they say will lead to better things, but sometimes I wish I would just follow my heart......But I know better than to do that.  My heart doesn't think rationally.  ::sigh::

and now I go into that peaceful slumber which tells me no lies.

I had a super weekend!  Like it was just too good to be true.  
but then monday came....and yeah

Monday night I went to the CYWE concert, and then I came home and finished my research paper.  I didn't have a lot to do, so it wasn't too bad.  Ben accidentally erased his on monday night, and had to type the entire thing again.  I felt really bad for him b/c he'd worked so hard on it.  But yeah, turned that in the other day, and now that's a huge weight that's been lifted off my shoulders.  

Algebra is improving....slowly...

Band:  Concert festival preview was last night.  It was pretty good.  not our best, but not nearly our worst.  We still have a lot of work to do before next week which really sucks.  

distance = hell

Ok, so here's the story of the prank war.  I was over at Leah's this weekend b/c Syd was at All-State, and we were just hanging out when I came across her pokemon cards.  She has like 500 of them (!!!).  Then I got this brilliant idea: Cover Syd's perfect room in pokemon cards.  It was awesome!  We had them everywhere!  and there are a bunch hidden around too, so she'll be finding them until she moves out.  It was great.
We'll Syd decided to get revenge.  and she enlisted the help of Caroline.  So, one day this week, Syd convinced one of Leah's friends in the Jr High to put all of the pokemon cards in Leah's locker.  I wasn't there, but I heard they were all over the place when Leah opened her locker.  
I knew that I was next, and I was expecting it.  So, after the concert last night, Caroline and Syd tell me that there's is a "surprise" in my car from them.  I knew what was going on, so it wasn't as great as it could've been but it was still good.  They put vaseline under the driver side door handle, and all over my windows.  it was pretty good.  I even got Daniel G. to fall for it like 5 minutes later when he walked up.  I got it off the door handle when I got home, but I left it on the windows.  I really don't care, I'll just go to a car wash this weekend, and hope that does the trick.  
Leah and I are already starting to plot our prank.  can't say here though.  More later.


I really miss what was....

so yeah, that's my life.  woo hoo!  

"find yourself another place to fall....we'll I don't see no holes in the road, but you find another place to fall...Are you proud, to have founded a brand new behavior, with hatred and hurt as your savior, but nobody's choosing to follow, so you choke back the tears and you swallow....There isn't much more I can say, for I don't understand the delay, you're asking for friendly advice, and remaining in permanent crisis, affection is yours if you ask, but first you must take off your mask........"- KT Tunstall
